languages.text: "Я здесь, стою пред тобой, именно для того, чтобы этого не повторилось впредь".
"I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."
languages.original_text: "Я здесь, стою пред тобой, именно для того, чтобы этого не повторилось впредь".

traits.locale_text: "I stand here before you to prevent it from happening ever again."
"I stand here before you to prevent it from happening ever again."
"I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."
"I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."
"I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

languages.text: “我现在站在你面前，正是为了防止同样的事件再次发生。”
languages.original_text: "I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

traits.locale_text: “我现在站在你面前，正是为了防止同样的事件再次发生。”

languages.text: «Estoy aquí hablando contigo precisamente para evitar que se repita».
languages.original_text: "I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

traits.locale_text: «Estoy aquí hablando contigo precisamente para evitar que se repita».

languages.text: « Si je me tiens devant vous à présent, c'est justement pour éviter qu'une telle situation se reproduise. »
languages.original_text: "I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

traits.locale_text: « Si je me tiens devant vous à présent, c'est justement pour éviter qu'une telle situation se reproduise. »

languages.text: "Ich stehe jetzt genau deshalb vor Euch, damit sich so etwas nicht wiederholt."
languages.original_text: "I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stehe jetzt genau deshalb vor Euch, damit sich so etwas nicht wiederholt."

languages.text: 「同じことを繰り返さないために、我は今、お前の前に立っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

traits.locale_text: 「同じことを繰り返さないために、我は今、お前の前に立っているのだ」

languages.original_text: "I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

languages.text: "Aynı durumun tekrar yaşanmaması için karşında duruyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am standing before you now precisely to avoid a repeat occurrence."

traits.locale_text: "Aynı durumun tekrar yaşanmaması için karşında duruyorum."
